# instanceDescriptorBuffer

**Instance Property**

A buffer that contains descriptions of each instance in the acceleration structure.

## Declaration

```swift
var instanceDescriptorBuffer: (any MTLBuffer)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You need to set a buffer before creating the instanced acceleration structure. The buffer needs to contain a list of instance data structures, each defining the characteristics of an instance. The descriptor’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLInstanceAccelerationStructureDescriptor/instanceDescriptorType] property determines which memory layout to use for the instance data; see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptorType] for more information.

## Specifying the list of instances

- **instanceCount**: The number of instances in the instance descriptor buffer.
- **instanceDescriptorBufferOffset**: The offset, in bytes, to the descripton of the first instance.
- **instanceDescriptorStride**: The stride, in bytes, between instance descriptions.
